backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented calculator features including UI components, arithmetic operations, display, logic, and visual theming with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of nine frontend files describing the calculator's React components, hooks, utilities, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm earth tone palette (terracotta, sand, olive).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the React application titled 'Personal Calculator'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the Calculator with gradient background, header, footer, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Calculator.tsx: Main calculator component orchestrating the display and 4-column button grid layout with number pad, operations, and function buttons using the useCalculator hook.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorButton: Reusable button component with four visual variants (number, operation, function, equals) styled with earth tones and active scale animations.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorDispla: Display component showing current calculation value or error messages with large typography in an inset panel with earth tone styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Identity authentication and creating backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalculator.ts: Custom hook managing calculator state including display value, operations, chaining calculations, decimal input, and division-by-zero error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient integration with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark themes using OKLCH color space for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and UI components.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names intelligently.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
Pure functions implementing basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide) with division-by-zero handling returning null.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a personal calculator app with five implemented features (UI, operations, display, logic, design theme) and one pending feature request for basic arithmetic operations.
